remarks: The ring of scalars of the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualsca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualsca.o $e |- O = ( oppR ` F ) $.
ldualsca.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualsca.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` D ) $.
ldualsca.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
ldualsca $p |- ( ph -> R = O ) $.
